jobDescription: Sr. Scientist II, Protein Science SUMMARY OF POSITION  The successful candidate will have broad experience with the full array skills employed in the biochemistry and molecular biology laboratory. The development, production, and characterization of bio-therapeutic enzymes and proteins is an integral part of this position. Particular importance is placed on the hands-on experience in cell biology, protein purification, enzyme kinetics assays, receptor pharmacology, cell signaling assays, and culture of multiple cell types including stable cell lines, stem cells, and primary cells (e.g. neuronal, muscle, and endothelial cells). Experience with biologic therapies and glycoproteins is strongly preferred.
